titleStmt.title: A treatise of the honor of Gods house: or, The true paterne of the Church, shewed in the parts and pietie of it with a discovery of the true cause and cure of our present contentions, and an answer of such objections as may offend the weake.
titleStmt.author: Yates, John, d. ca. 1660.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T[homas] C[otes] for William Cooke, and are to be sold at his shop neere Furnivalls Inne Gate in Holbourne,

notesStmt.note: Dedication signed: Iohn Yates, i.e. John Yates (d. ca. 1660), but possibly by another John Yates.
The first leaf and the last leaf are blank.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his shop neere Furnivalls Inne Gate in Holbourne
